raw_storage_container = 'n/a' + storage_account
raw_storage_source_folder = 'n/a'
raw_storage_source_name = 'n/a'
workspace_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-workspace@' + storage_account
workspace_storage_temp_folder = 'employee-syn'
workspace_storage_temp_name = 'employee-syn'
harmonised_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-harmonised@' + storage_account
json_schema_folder='json_schema'
json_schema_file_name='absence_schema.json'
harmonised_storage_delta_folder = 'daya_temp'
harmonised_storage_delta_table_name = 'daya_temp'
delta_lake_table_key_column = 'n/a'
delta_lake_table_name = "daya_temp"
delta_lake_database_name = "odw_harmonised_db"
sourceColumnNames = 'n/a'

# Temporary code to change it later
import pandas as pd
import requests
import io

path =  raw_storage_container + 'odw-harmonised/json_schema/absence_schema.json'
print(path)

url= 'https://pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.blob.core.windows.net/odw-harmonised/json_schema/absence_schema.json'

s=requests.get(url).content
print(s)
c=pd.read_json(io.StringIO(s.decode('utf-8')))

print('------direct---')
data = pd.read_json(url)
print(data)

# Temporary code to change it later
from pyspark.sql.types import *

path =  raw_storage_container + 'odw-harmonised/json_schema/absence_schema.json'
print(path)
df = spark.read.json(path)
df.show()

# Import modules
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType ,DoubleType
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
harmonised_storage_delta_table_path = harmonised_storage_container + '/' + harmonised_storage_delta_folder + '/' + harmonised_storage_delta_table_name
print('------------harmonised_storage_delta_table_path-----'+harmonised_storage_delta_table_path)

if not (DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark,harmonised_storage_delta_table_path)):
    harmonisationInspectordf = spark.createDataFrame([], new_schema)
    harmonisationInspectordf.write.option("mergeSchema", "true").format('delta').mode('overwrite').save(harmonised_storage_delta_table_path)
    spark.sql("CREATE TABLE {0}.{1} USING DELTA LOCATION '{2}'".format(delta_lake_database_name,delta_lake_table_name,harmonised_storage_delta_table_path))

json_schema_file_path = harmonised_storage_container + '/' + json_schema_folder + '/' + json_schema_file_name
df = spark.read.json(json_schema_file_path)

df.show
